recipesJson.name: Pugorilla
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description:
Not rocket science here, you can sub out any BlackBerry for super concentrate BlackBerry, but it is definitely unique, and would strongly advise adding it to Your Arsenal ASAP. You don't have to take my word for it here is a review from mlNikon.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/5x8q6j/sc_blackberry/

TFA sweet and tart- so if you are looking for a sweet tart flavor this is it. I was surprised how accurate the flavor was by itself. But the name can be misleading, sweetheart candies aren't very sweet or tart ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”Unfortunately it does fall short in the tart category, if you're going for that Sour Patch Kids malic acid sort of thing.
